And when this absentee father returns one winter, with an = unexpected revelation, the Tenenbaums find that genius doesn't help any in= reuniting a dysfunctional family. From Wes Anderson, the director of Bott= le Rocket and Rushmore, The Royal Tenenbaums is the hilarious story of = a family of brilliant eccentrics--and how they got that way. Gene Hackman,= Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow, Luke Wilson, Owen Wilson, = and Bill Murray star.
